## Introduction

This app deals with a data set that talks about people sleeping alone vs. sleeping with a spouse or significant other. The dataset is called [sleeping-alone-data.csv](https://sleeping.data.csv) and was found on the GitHub of FiveThirtyEight which was added by the user anderewflowers.
